ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the same video card and it runs great on mine. But it is a 64mb one.. and I have an AMD 1.4Ghz processor and 2Gb of RAM.. luv, -Su What video card do
ygData.messageBody:
I have the same video card and it runs great on mine. But it is a 64mb one..
and I have an AMD 1.4Ghz processor and 2Gb of RAM..
luv,
-Su


What video card do you have? I have a Geforce 2 MX. When I first started
playing with the Luclin expansion, it ran like crap until I turned down the
clip plane and then it ran great and all was well.
----- Original Message -----
From: justin
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2002 5:06 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] hello


Hello everyone. I am finally happy I finally got to play everquest
again. I had to reformat my hard drive and reinstall everything in order to
do it but the game now works and with the new video card i picked up the
graphics are awsome! Talk to you all soon.
